revised_title: Early Development and Embryology of Cirripedia
tldr: The author studied the early development and embryology of Cirripedia, focusing on Balanus perforatus and other members of the group. They investigated the methods of obtaining ova, embryos, and Nauplii, as well as the seasons when these stages can be found. The author found a great uniformity in the development of different forms and confirmed previous work on certain points while establishing new facts that reconciled seemingly discordant opinions.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
